name: Fertilizer, switchgrass, 2022
description: Total Fertilizer input for one hectare of switchgrass annualized for a 10-yr production period. Projections based on published data and yeild projections to the year 2022.
category: 11: Agriculture, Forestry, Fishing and Hunting/1151: Support Activities for Crop Production

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

flow.name: Fertilizer, switchgrass
flow.category: Technosphere Flows/11: Agriculture, Forestry, Fishing and Hunting/1151: Support Activities for Crop Production

flow.name: Potassium chloride, as K2O, at regional storehouse

exchanges.description: Proxy: Triple superphosphate, as P2O5, at regional storehouse/RER with US electricity U. Triple super phosphate is 48% P2O5

flow.name: Nitrogen fertilizer, production mix, at plant
flow.category: Technosphere Flows/31-33: Manufacturing/3253: Pesticide, Fertilizer, and Other Agricultural Chemical Manufacturing

defaultProvider.name: Nitrogen fertilizer, production mix, at plant
defaultProvider.category: 31-33: Manufacturing/3253: Pesticide, Fertilizer, and Other Agricultural Chemical Manufacturing

exchanges.description: transport to field. 2.61 tkm for ammonium nitrate, 0.181 tkm for triple phosphate, 4.09 tkm for potassium nitrate, 2.61 tkm for Urea as N.

flow.name: Transport, combination truck, diesel powered
flow.category: Technosphere Flows/48-49: Transportation and Warehousing/4841: General Freight Trucking

defaultProvider.name: Transport, combination truck, diesel powered
defaultProvider.category: 48-49: Transportation and Warehousing/4841: General Freight Trucking

exchanges.description: Assuming 1.25% of N applied is lost via denitrification as N2O. IPCC 1997. Will likely need to be adjusted.
NO3-N leaching, assuming 30% of fertilizer N applied leaches below the root zone. IPCC 1997. This will likely need adjustment because N will not leach as much due to the continuous cover of SG

Proxy: Ammonium nitrate, as N, at regional storehouse/RER with US electricity U. N application is split equally, in terms of N applied, between ammonium nitrate and urea b/c they are the least expensive grannular N forms (USDA-ERS, 2007). Ammonium nitrate is 33% N

flow.name: Ammonia, steam reforming, liquid, at plant
flow.category: Technosphere Flows/31-33: Manufacturing/3253: Pesticide, Fertilizer, and Other Agricultural Chemical Manufacturing

defaultProvider.name: Ammonia, steam reforming, liquid, at plant
defaultProvider.category: 31-33: Manufacturing/3253: Pesticide, Fertilizer, and Other Agricultural Chemical Manufacturing

exchanges.description: Assuming 10% of N applied volatalizes to NH3. IPCC 1997. Will likely need adjustmetn b/c N fertlizer will be applied to SG in granular form which does not volatalize as much.
